data.text:
Looking for further improvements, we'd come to the summer camp. 
Maruzensky rose in good spirits on the final day.
data.processed:
<story>Looking for further improvements, we'd come to the summer camp. 
<story>Maruzensky rose in good spirits on the final day.

data.text:
Morning, trainer. Ready up! We've got 
another day of training ahead!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Morning, trainer. Ready up! We've got 
<story>another day of training ahead!

data.text:
Morning, trainer. Ready up! We've got 
another day of training ahead!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Morning, trainer. Ready up! We've got 
<story>another day of training ahead!

data.text: The last one. Let's smash it out the park!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>The last one. Let's smash it out the park!

data.text: With a spirited Maruzensky, I wholeheartedly faced the last day.
data.processed: <story>With a spirited Maruzensky, I wholeheartedly faced the last day.

data.text:
Phew… Good job, trainer! Hmhm, we're 
both dripping with sweat huh—
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Phew… Good job, trainer! Hmhm, we're 
<story>both dripping with sweat huh—

data.text:
Phew… Good job, trainer! Hmhm, we're 
both dripping with sweat huh—
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Phew… Good job, trainer! Hmhm, we're 
<story>both dripping with sweat huh—

data.text: Yeah! I'm exhausted, but I feel so good, fulfilled perhaps!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Yeah! I'm exhausted, but I feel so good, fulfilled perhaps!

data.text:
I truly feel like we accomplished something in 
training. The next race should be fun. Ehehe, 
you'll have something to look forward to.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>I truly feel like we accomplished something in 
<story>training. The next race should be fun. Ehehe, 
<story>you'll have something to look forward to.

data.text:
But… trainer, are you okay? Aren't you exhausted 
from standing out in the hot sun all day?
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: I'll be fine with some rest.

data.processed:
<story>But… trainer, are you okay? Aren't you exhausted 
<story>from standing out in the hot sun all day?

data.text:
But… trainer, are you okay? Aren't you exhausted 
from standing out in the hot sun all day?
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: I'll be fine with some rest.

data.processed:
<story>But… trainer, are you okay? Aren't you exhausted 
<story>from standing out in the hot sun all day?

data.text: Really? Don't push yourself, okay?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Really? Don't push yourself, okay?

data.text:
Well then, let's go home and freshen up. We need 
to get a good rest after all that work!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Well then, let's go home and freshen up. We need 
<story>to get a good rest after all that work!

data.text:
We returned to our lodgings and took a bath. 
When I went to take in the night breeze afterwards—
data.processed:
<story>We returned to our lodgings and took a bath. 
<story>When I went to take in the night breeze afterwards—

data.text:
"I'll be fine with some rest"… 
But I'm sure trainer's tired… Am I pushing too hard?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>"I'll be fine with some rest"… 
<story>But I'm sure trainer's tired… Am I pushing too hard?

data.text: But…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>But…

data.text: Oh, trainer.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Oh, trainer.

data.text: Oh, trainer.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Oh, trainer.

data.text:
Umm… the younger kids told me that a nearby 
shrine's holding a festival right now.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Umm… the younger kids told me that a nearby 
<story>shrine's holding a festival right now.

data.text: So…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>So…

data.text: …Yep, I'm asking you to come with!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>…Yep, I'm asking you to come with!

data.text: How about having dinner at one of the festival stalls!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>How about having dinner at one of the festival stalls!

data.text:
I heard there are stalls with games, and they're having a Bon 
dance too. I bet we'd have a great time together!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>I heard there are stalls with games, and they're having a Bon 
<story>dance too. I bet we'd have a great time together!

data.text: Ahah, fabulous!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Ahah, fabulous!

data.text:
All right! Now that's decided, let's get 
our groove on at that Bon dance!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>All right! Now that's decided, let's get 
<story>our groove on at that Bon dance!

data.text: Come, come, trainer! Over here!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Come, come, trainer! Over here!

data.text: Come, come, trainer! Over here!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Come, come, trainer! Over here!

data.text:
Wow! Of course it's packed with people. There's a stall that 
piqued my interest, but can we even find it?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Wow! Of course it's packed with people. There's a stall that 
<story>piqued my interest, but can we even find it?

data.text: Eheheh♪ It's not just any food stall, okay? Get this…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Eheheh♪ It's not just any food stall, okay? Get this…

data.text: They sell the hippest and raddest sweets!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>They sell the hippest and raddest sweets!

data.text:
One's called the "Carrot DX Tower Parfait". They only sell it in 
summer and it's a very popular treat with horsegirls.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>One's called the "Carrot DX Tower Parfait". They only sell it in 
<story>summer and it's a very popular treat with horsegirls.

data.text:
I'm a little worried they'll sell out, but I'd rather save the 
sweets stands for later, you know?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>I'm a little worried they'll sell out, but I'd rather save the 
<story>sweets stands for later, you know?

data.text: We should start with—
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>We should start with—

data.text: （Pon-poro-pon-poro～♪)
data.processed: <story>（Pon-poro-pon-poro～♪)

data.text:
—this! The Bon dance! I danced my heart out to this with my 
family as a child… where are the times.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>—this! The Bon dance! I danced my heart out to this with my 
<story>family as a child… where are the times.

data.text: Right on! Get down and boogie with me!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Right on! Get down and boogie with me!

data.text:
I joined in the Bon dancing crowd with Maruzensky. She moved like 
second nature and that didn't go unnoticed by the other dancers—
data.processed:
<story>I joined in the Bon dancing crowd with Maruzensky. She moved like 
<story>second nature and that didn't go unnoticed by the other dancers—

data.text:
Whoo! I could dance all night～! 
Come on, trainer! Are you jivin'～?!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Whoo! I could dance all night～! 
<story>Come on, trainer! Are you jivin'～?!

data.text:
Whoo! I could dance all night～! 
Come on, trainer! Are you jivin'～?!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Whoo! I could dance all night～! 
<story>Come on, trainer! Are you jivin'～?!

data.text:
At some point I think we started dancing something quite different 
from a "Bon" dance, everybody was so into it……
data.processed:
<story>At some point I think we started dancing something quite different 
<story>from a "Bon" dance, everybody was so into it……

data.text: Mmmmmm～! I had a blast! So did you it seems, trainer!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Mmmmmm～! I had a blast! So did you it seems, trainer!

data.text: Mmmmmm～! I had a blast! So did you it seems, trainer!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Mmmmmm～! I had a blast! So did you it seems, trainer!

data.text:
Right? Everyone was grooving! I even got 
up on the platform in my excitement♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Right? Everyone was grooving! I even got 
<story>up on the platform in my excitement♪

data.text:
When I stood near the drums I could feel the beat 
run through me! It was an absolute fry!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>When I stood near the drums I could feel the beat 
<story>run through me! It was an absolute fry!

data.text:
I often heard it from my mom; "The platform has you vibin'!". 
Eheh, like daughter, like mother, right?
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: I see. So your mother's to blame…
I see. So your mother's to blame…

data.processed:
<story>I often heard it from my mom; "The platform has you vibin'!". 
<story>Eheh, like daughter, like mother, right?

data.text: Hmm? Did you say something?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Hmm? Did you say something?

data.text: Hey, never mind that, let's go find those sweets!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Hey, never mind that, let's go find those sweets!

data.text: Here I come, Carrot DX Tower Parfait!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Here I come, Carrot DX Tower Parfait!

data.text:
After buying a "Carrot DX Tower Parfait" and enjoying the other 
food stalls, we headed back to the camp lodgings.
data.processed:
<story>After buying a "Carrot DX Tower Parfait" and enjoying the other 
<story>food stalls, we headed back to the camp lodgings.

data.text:
The parfait was amazing～! The macarons on top were filled 
with ice cream… My tummy and my heart are both sated♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>The parfait was amazing～! The macarons on top were filled 
<story>with ice cream… My tummy and my heart are both sated♪

data.text:
Running around the beach, dancing at 
the Bon, eating the hippest sweets…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Running around the beach, dancing at 
<story>the Bon, eating the hippest sweets…

data.text: I never thought I'd be spending times like these with someone～
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>I never thought I'd be spending times like these with someone～

data.text: It was a lot of fun. Will you accompany me again in the future?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>It was a lot of fun. Will you accompany me again in the future?

data.text:
Traaaiiner, are you sure you want to 
answer without a second thought～?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Traaaiiner, are you sure you want to 
<story>answer without a second thought～?

data.text:
Traaaiiner, are you sure you want to 
answer without a second thought～?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Traaaiiner, are you sure you want to 
<story>answer without a second thought～?

data.text:
I'll drag you along with my whims and fancies. 
To all sorts of places, doing all sorts of things～
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>I'll drag you along with my whims and fancies. 
<story>To all sorts of places, doing all sorts of things～

data.text:
Hmhm, I know you're tired… But okay! I'll have 
to have a good think about our next outing!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Hmhm, I know you're tired… But okay! I'll have 
<story>to have a good think about our next outing!

data.text:
…It's really strange, though. I feel so much 
more free with you than when I'm alone.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>…It's really strange, though. I feel so much 
<story>more free with you than when I'm alone.

data.text:
…It's really curious, though. I feel so much 
more free with you than when I'm alone.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>…It's really curious, though. I feel so much 
<story>more free with you than when I'm alone.

data.text:
I can go anywhere, I can run, I can do anything. 
Trainer, you make me feel that way.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>I can go anywhere, I can run, I can do anything. 
<story>Trainer, you make me feel that way.

data.text:
I can go anywhere, I can run, I can do anything. 
Trainer, you make me feel that way.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>I can go anywhere, I can run, I can do anything. 
<story>Trainer, you make me feel that way.

data.text: And that's… You're so fun to be around, trainer!
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: I enjoy my time with you too.

data.processed: <story>And that's… You're so fun to be around, trainer!

data.text: I can't believe…  Being with you's so much fun, Trainer!
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: Being with you is great too.

data.processed: <story>I can't believe…  Being with you's so much fun, Trainer!

data.text: My! So we have a mutual relationship♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>My! So we have a mutual relationship♪

data.text:
It's a little embarrassing to say again, but… I hope we can 
continue to share the fun together.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>It's a little embarrassing to say again, but… I hope we can 
<story>continue to share the fun together.

data.text:
A horsegirl and her trainer… in perfect harmony. 
Treat me well, trainer… partner!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>A horsegirl and her trainer… in perfect harmony. 
<story>Treat me well, trainer… partner!
